about_the_game:
You are the best special forces squad of the Empire. Your task is to land on the desert planet XBS-87 and capture all the cities of the followers of the Iron God cult. Destroy everything you see. The main goal is to find and destroy huge combat robots. These Titans threaten the Emperor's power. And one more thing: watch the sand, creatures worse than cyborgs may be hiding under it

Co-op up to 4 players

Fight dangerous creatures of the planet XBS-87 with your friends! Develop a strategy, use different skills and weapons, mix play styles and free the galaxy from the cruel followers of the Iron God cult

Unique gameplay

Your team has 10 attempts to capture the enemy city and destroy the Titan, after each attempt you choose a power-up. If you fail in 10 attempts, you start over

Active spells

You have 4 active skills at your disposal. The Engineer can build turrets. The Medic can heal the team. The Defender knows how to put up energy shields. Berserk deals massive damage to enemies for a short period of time

Map randomization

After each death, the map will partially change. Don't even try to remember the way to the Titan - the desert is changeable

Sci-fi weapons and armor

The Emperor is ready to provide you with the best weapons to destroy the cultists. Destroy your enemies with plasma, burn them with lasers and blast them with rockets, they deserve it!

Destructibility

Each map has a large number of destructible buildings, bridges and beams. Why not fire a rocket at the wall your friend is standing on? It's fun!

name: Ironsand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Ironsand is a co-op hardcore rogue-lite FPS. Your team lands on a desert planet full of various enemies. You are given 10 attempts to capture each of the cities and destroy desert monsters, cyborgs and the main goal - the huge Titan combat robots
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
